Name: Topic_0
Representative_Docs: ['Best label printer for mini labels? Sorry if I didn’t explain better in the title but my shop already has jars and boxes for disposables with our branding. What Im looking for is the best printer for adding the little labels like 1 3/4 x 1/2 in for strains and coa qr codes. Looking to make the most out of my time and be efficient. Would you suggest a thermal or a laser printer? The benefit of thermal printing is obvious but I dont know if there is a thermal printer that would allow me to do sheets at a time? Thank you so much for your help as always and happy new year', "Decent Shredder & Upgrade my Buddy Box 1 1/4  Currently, I'm shredding my weed by hand and using the Buddy Box; it was nice and fun but sales are picking up to the point where i want to automate the process a bit.  Looking for some upgrades in shredding and separating and filling cones.  Curious if there is any other players out there besides Futurola products.", 'King Kone metering tray  I have a small preroll business and we just got the King Kone machine. We got the half gram metering tray and when filled it’s consistently producing .35g prerolls. It’s frustrating because now we have to adjust by hand, which defeats the point of having the machine in the first place. I’ve tried different grinding, different flower, etc. and it’s .35 every time. Anyone else have this experience?']

Name: Topic_1
Representative_Docs:
['Cannabis focused and specialized MSP/IT Services Looking for Input from owners and people in the Industry I am exploring the idea of starting up an MSP that is focused specifically on the cannabis industry. I am looking to offer a standardized tech stack with management to solve the It challenges in the industry.

Off the top I am thinking about the following IT needs but would love to hear where people are struggling and if this is something they would be willing to pay for even better if you wanna DM me some details on what kind of budget is available at dispensaries for this type of service.

Anti-Virus

Email Hosting

Website management

Video Recording Software data management and backups

POS system

Security System (Physical Access)

M365 with Entra ID for Identity Access Management

Software integrations

SEO help

Break-Fix maintenance on IT hardware

CRM Management

Timeclock Management

This is just my initial brainstorming of possible service but would love to know where owners need help and if they would be interested in working with a vendor that specializes in cannabis IT management. ', "r/ORWeedBiz started a new blacklist for shops that don't pay their bills! Please contribute! The last two times we posted a list, it made waves in the Oregon Cannabis community. So many of the shops on list v2.0 are out of business now, or had to be restructured. It made more sense to start from scratch this time, so please contribute if you know anyone!

[Blacklist for OR cannabis companies that have issues with non-payment](https://www.reddit.com/r/ORWeedBiz/comments/1ej4gl8/new_2024_official_black_list_for_dispensaries/)", 'Biden Makes Historic Marijuana Rescheduling Announcement, Applauding ‘Monumental’ Move To Reverse ‘Longstanding Inequities’ ']
